org.apache.flink.api.java.io.jdbc

类 JDBCOutputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichOutputFormat<Row>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.io.jdbc.JDBCOutputFormat
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, OutputFormat<Row>

    public class JDBCOutputFormat
extends RichOutputFormat<Row>
    OutputFormat to write Rows into a JDBC database. The OutputFormat has to be configured using the supplied OutputFormatBuilder.
    另请参阅:
    Row, DriverManager, 序列化表格

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Configures this output format. Since output formats are instantiated generically and hence parameterless, this method is the place where the output formats set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated output format.

        参数:
        parameters - The configuration with all parameters.

      • open

        public void open(int taskNumber,
                 int numTasks)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to the target database and initializes the prepared statement.
        参数:
        taskNumber - The number of the parallel instance.
        numTasks - The number of parallel tasks.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the output could not be opened due to an I/O problem.

      • establishConnection

        private void establishConnection()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • writeRecord

        public void writeRecord(Row row)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a record to the prepared statement.

        When this method is called, the output format is guaranteed to be opened.

        WARNING: this may fail when no column types specified (because a best effort approach is attempted in order to insert a null value but it's not guaranteed that the JDBC driver handles PreparedStatement.setObject(pos, null))

        参数:
        row - The records to add to the output.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the records could not be added due to an I/O problem.
        另请参阅:
        PreparedStatement

      • flush

        void flush()

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Executes prepared statement and closes all resources of this instance.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the input could not be closed properly.
